result.eng: There only a couple of minutes left.

result.eng: I only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.

result.ponchtml: níl an teaċ aċ cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil aċ fós bíonn an-ṁoill ormI only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.

result.eng: Wait a minute and I will get the notebooks for you.
result.ga: fanaigí nóiméad agus gheobhaidh mé na cóipleabhair dhaoibh

result.eng: I'll see you in twenty minutes' time.
result.ga: feicfidh mé thú i gceann fiche nóiméad

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith

result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
